name: twitter-bot
description: Twitter Marketing Automation Tool with anti-bot detection bypass

scripts.validate: npm run build && node dist/index.js validate
scripts.scrape: npm run build && node dist/index.js scrape
scripts.campaign: npm run build && node dist/index.js campaign
scripts.warmup: npm run build && node dist/index.js warmup
scripts.action: npm run build && node dist/index.js action
